thread.title: Motherjane to perform in city
thread.title_full: Motherjane to perform in city - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Motherjane to perform in city
text: Motherjane is a Kochi-based progressive rock band. Their music is inspired by the vast soundscape of India. Motherjane had recently celebrated 19 years of making music by releasing their latest single Clay Play. The band consists of John Thomas (drums/percussion), Clyde Rozario (bass guitar), Nithin Vijayanath (lead/rhythm guitar) and Vivek Thomas (vocals). The concert is scheduled to take place on September 17 (8 pm) at Hard Rock Cafe, 40, St Marks Road, Near Koshy's.
